thread.title: Chipper gets strange request from customer feeling a little under the weather
thread.title_full: Chipper gets strange request from customer feeling a little under the weather

title: Chipper gets strange request from customer feeling a little under the weather
text:
Chipper gets strange request from customer feeling a little under the weather Independent.ie A chipper has fulfilled a strange request from a customer a little under the weather. http://www.independent.ie/entertainment/banter/trending/chipper-gets-strange-request-from-customer-feeling-a-little-under-the-weather-35332210.html A chipper has fulfilled a strange request from a customer a little under the weather. Share Chipper gets strange request from customer feeling a little under the weather Independent.ie A chipper has fulfilled a strange request from a customer a little under the weather. http://www.independent.ie/entertainment/banter/trending/chipper-gets-strange-request-from-customer-feeling-a-little-under-the-weather-35332210.html 
But it wasn't a fish supper she was after from Feeley's chip shop in west Belfast. 
In the notes to the driver on the order, the customer said: 
"Will you please stop in Spar on the way and get me Benylin cold and flu tablets and I'll give you the money, only ordering food so I can get the tablets, I'm dying sick xx [sic]." 
And Feeley's replied: "Good to see my customers making use of the "add comments" section Words absolutely fail me". 
But the chippy came through for her, posting a picture of the cold medicine on its Facebook page.
